news.title: Why Bitcoin has recently reacted more to liquidity conditions than to rate cuts
news.titleOriginal: Why Bitcoin has recently reacted more to liquidity conditions than to rate cuts
news.summary: Bitcoin’s recent moves track liquidity stress more than Fed rate cuts. Here’s how balance sheet policy and cash flows shape crypto markets.

news.title: Hong Kong greenlights crypto margin financing and perpetual trading
news.titleOriginal: Hong Kong greenlights crypto margin financing and perpetual trading
news.summary: Hong Kong’s SFC will allow licensed brokers to offer digital asset margin financing and set a framework for crypto perpetuals for professionals.

news.title: Ethereum holders in ‘full-scale’ accumulation as ETH price drops below $2K
news.titleOriginal: Ethereum holders in ‘full-scale’ accumulation as ETH price drops below $2K
news.summary: Ether inflows into accumulation addresses spike despite ETH price falling below $2,000, signalling strong investor confidence in the long term.
